items.title: Michael Moritz: the richest Welshman to walk the Earth
items.description: Michael Moritz started out as a journalist before catching the eye of a Silicon Valley titan. He finds Donald Trump to be “an absurd buffoon”

items.title: Coface offers excess profit in an unloved sector

items.title: Exciting opportunities in biotech
items.description: Biotech firms should profit from the ‘patent cliff’, which will force big pharmaceutical companies to innovate or make acquisitions

items.title: How to invest in the new breed of payment providers
items.description: Upstart payment providers are taking the world by storm. It’s time for investors to buy in, says Rupert Hargreaves
